hero: Train Facts is your sushi of information for the 2019 Japan Tour.
body:
Train Facts is an app by Adrian to keep you informed with what you need to know. Itinerary, contact and hotel details, and quick links - It's your sushi of information for the 2019 Japan Tour.
 
 For more updates on Train Facts, please go to trainfacts.github.io!
contact: For help, please contact Adrian - adrian.marcus.widjaja@gmail.com
version: To view latest verison information, connect to the Internet or visit trainfacts.github.io
